title: Stop wages from being garnished due to wrong person
question: my son accidentally was using a credit card that came in the mail thinking to be his he ending up not paying and the account was closed 5 years later there garnishing my wages how can i stop this and tell them its my son debt not mine even though it was my social security number my son who takes full responsibility is willing to pay it off
answers:
The creditor will stop garnishing your wages as soon as your son (or someone) pays off the debt. If your son can't pay it off all at once, the garnishment will continue until the judgment is satisfied, but if he pays off some of it, the creditor doesn't need to garnish as much.

Make sure the creditor files a satisfaction of judgment once it's completely paid off.
